title: 1925년 Appeal of Wallach 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Appeal of Wallach. 판결일: 1925-01-13. 법원: United States Board of Tax Appeals.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Appeal of WALLACH & MAYER, INC.
**판결일**: 1925-01-13
**법원**: United States Board of Tax Appeals
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Korner, Ivins, Marquette

## 변호인

Oscar Winkler, C.P.A.,  for the taxpayer.   W. D. Nance, Esq.  (Nelson T. Hartson, Solicitor of Internal Revenue) for the Commissioner.  

## 인용

- 1925 BTA LEXIS 2972
- 1 B.T.A. 316

## 판결문 요약


*317DECISION.
The action of the division in dismissing the appeal herein is reversed on the authority of the Appeal of California Associated Raisin Company, 1 B. T. A. 314, and is hereby ordered restored to the calendar for hearing.
...
